   19: %%
   20: -module(ts_if_1_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   28: %% Info = [tuple()]
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{timetrap,{seconds,2}}].
   32: 
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   35: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   36: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   37: %% Reason = term()
   38: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   40:     Config.
   41: 
   42: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   44: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   47:     ok.
   48: 
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   51: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   52: %% GroupName = atom()
   53: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   54: %% Reason = term()
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: init_per_group(g1, _Config) ->
   57:     {skip,g1_got_skipped};
   58: init_per_group(g3, _Config) ->
   59:     {skip,g3_got_skipped};
   60: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   65: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   66: %% GroupName = atom()
   67: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   70:     ok.
   71: 
   72: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   73: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   74: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   75: %% TestCase = atom()
   76: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   77: %% Reason = term()
   78: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   79: init_per_testcase(tc1, Config) ->
   80:     ct:sleep(5000),
   81:     Config;
   82: init_per_testcase(tc8, _Config) ->
   83:     {skip,"tc8 skipped"};
   84: init_per_testcase(tc11, Config) ->
   85:     bad_format;
   86: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   87:     Config.
   88: 
   89: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   90: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   91: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   92: %% TestCase = atom()
   93: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   94: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   95: end_per_testcase(tc2, Config) ->
   96:     ct:sleep(5000);
   97: end_per_testcase(tc12, Config) ->
   98:     ct:comment("end_per_testcase(tc12) called!"),
   99:     ct:pal("end_per_testcase(tc12) called!", []),
  100:     ok;
  101: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  102:     ok.
  103: 
  104: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  105: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
  106: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
  107: %% GroupName = atom()
  108: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
  109: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  110: %% TestCase = atom()
  111: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
  112: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  113: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  114: %% N = integer() | forever
  115: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  116: groups() ->
  117:     [{g1,[],[gtc1]},
  118:      {g2,[parallel],[{g3,[],[gtc2]}]},
  119:      
  120:      {seq2,[sequence],[tc4,tc5]}].
  121: 
  122: sequences() ->
  123:     [{seq1,[tc4,tc5]}].
  124: 
  125: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  126: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  127: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  128: %% GroupName = atom()
  129: %% TestCase = atom()
  130: %% Reason = term()
  131: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  132: all() -> 
  133:     [tc1, tc2, tc3,
  134:      {sequence,seq1},
  135:      {group,seq2},
  136:      tc6, tc7, 
  137:      tc8, tc9, tc10, 
  138:      tc11,
  139:      {group,g1},
  140:      {group,g2},
  141:      tc12, tc13].
  142: 
  143: tc1(_) ->
  144:     exit(should_have_been_skipped).
  145: 
  146: tc2(_) ->
  147:     timeout_in_end_per_testcase.
  148: 
  149: tc3(_) ->
  150:    ct:sleep(5000).
  151: 
  152: tc4(_) ->
  153:     exit(failed_on_purpose).
  154: 
  155: tc5(_) ->
  156:     exit(should_have_been_skipped).
  157: 
  158: tc6() ->
  159:     [{require,void}].
  160: tc6(_) ->
  161:     exit(should_have_been_skipped).
  162: 
  163: tc7() ->
  164:     bad_format.
  165: tc7(_) ->
  166:     done.
  167: 
  168: tc8(_) ->
  169:     exit(should_have_been_skipped).
  170: 
  171: tc9(_) ->
  172:     {skip,'tc9 skipped'}.
  173: 
  174: tc10(config) ->
  175:     done.
  176: 
  177: tc11(_) ->
  178:     exit(should_have_been_skipped).
  179: 
  180: 
  181: gtc1(_) ->
  182:     exit(should_have_been_skipped).
  183: 
  184: gtc2(_) ->
  185:     exit(should_have_been_skipped).
  186: 
  187: tc12(_) ->
  188:     F = fun() -> ct:abort_current_testcase('stopping tc12') end,
  189:     spawn(F),
  190:     ct:sleep(1000),
  191:     exit(should_have_been_aborted).
  192: 
  193: tc13(_) ->
  194:     success.
  195: 
  196:
